title: Chocolate and prune tart
description: The combination of prunes, chocolate and brandy rarely fails to please and this deliciously dark and sophisticated tart uses cocoa pastry for an extra chocolate hit.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz ready-to-eat prunes (ideally d’Agen), cut into quarters
75g/2½oz dark chocolate, broken into small pieces
100g/3½oz cold unsalted butter, cut into roughly 1cm/½in dice
